title: [ Ping ] Ping increase between today and yesterday
body:
Last night, my ping was about 25ms. Tonight, it's hovering around 75ms. No change in my computer or internet service otherwise.

* **Location:** NYC
* **ISP:** Verizon FIOS
* **Internet Speed:** 100mbps up and down
* **Internet Connection Type:** Ethernet
* **Computer:** Alienware Aurora r7

Thanks for the help in advance.

replies.body: It kind of sounds like it might have been a small blip in some ISP routing since most of the reports were coming from around the NY area, glad it's fixed up on your end regardless though! I wasn't in the office when you posted this, but I'll be sure to check around to see if anything major might have happened.

Yes. My ping has been a constant 36-38 ms for a year+ (since the servers moved), and tonight it's a constant 83-84 ms for no reason. Nothing changed on my end, all my speed tests and everything (ping, upload, download) give the exact same results as they did December 21st. Webpages, twitch streaming, youtube, downloads all are perfectly fine and normal and lightning fast. League client however has double+ ping.

The ping went up mid game after a huge lag spike (game pausing for me for about 10 seconds), after that nothing lowered the ping back down (resetting router, pc, etc).

I'm "glad" someone else is having this problem.
When I checked my ping to their server just now, this morning, it was 23ms. What the heck happened?
Yup, back to normal too. I have no idea but I'm glad it's over. We made it through this tough time together.

Yesterday, me and 2 other people in my match also had massive ping spikes in one of our games. My spike lasted a good 10-20 seconds, going up to 6k ping as one point, whereas their issue lasted for a good 10 minutes, with them spiking as high as 9k. However, I have had a constant 150-200 ping for as long as I can remember, and I'm still hovering around 180 right now.

> [{quoted}](name=icedballs,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=GFqYJBPz,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-12-28T08:17:04.501+0000)

SAME! Ive been bugging out i updated everything, nothing. I reinstall, nothing. wth is going on
it still happening and its later in the day from like 8pm - 2 am
thats ironic im back at my original ping of 27, im also in new york btw
